price: 22. Zeker, zij zijn degenen die de grootste verliezers in het hiernamaals zullen zijn.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
